sqlMap.update: update cart set amount=#amount# where userid=#userid# and cscode=#cscode#
sqlMap.delete: delete from cart where userid=#userid# and cscode=#cscode#
sqlMap.select: select l.ocode,pname,'-'||usepoint point from orderList l, orderMain m,product p where l.ocode=m.ocode and l.cscode=p.cscode and userid=#userid# union select l.ocode,pname,'+'||savepoint point from orderList l, orderMain m,product p where l.ocode=m.ocode and l.cscode=p.cscode and userid=#userid# order by ocode desc

select cname||' '||discountrate||'% 할인' coupon, applymoney||'원 이상 주문 시 사용가능' subject1, '최대 '||maxDiscmoney||'원 할인 가능' subject2,sdate||'~'||edate usedate from couponList l, coupon c where c.CCODE = l.CCODE and userid=#userid# and sysdate<edate

select userid,c.cscode,c.pcode,pname,price,amount,substr(c.cscode,7,1) cssize,substr(c.cscode,8) cscolor,round(price*0.001) savepoint from cart c, product p where userid=#userid# and c.cscode=p.cscode
